title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee

**Elevate Your Game with the TOSY Flying Disc - The Ultimate Light Show in Your Hands!**

Are you ready to turn heads at the park, dazzle your friends, and be the life of the party? The TOSY Flying Disc isn't just any frisbee ‚Äì it's a high-tech, LED-lit spectacle with 36 ultra-bright LEDs capable of displaying a mesmerizing array of 16 million colors!

The TOSY Flying Disc promises to deliver not just during daytime play, but it will transform your night games into an illuminated festival of colors.

**Features:**

- **Dazzling Display:** With 36 LEDs shining 100 times brighter than any other light-up disc, your frisbee experience goes from fun to phenomenal.
- **Smart Tech:** Intelligent motion sensors automatically light up the disc, ensuring it's always visible and ready for action. Plus, customize your play with smart modes that adjust brightness and include a timer.
- **Endless Play:** Recharge quickly with the included USB Type C to C cable and enjoy up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match on a single charge. (Charger not included)
- **Ultimate Durability:** Whether you're diving for a catch on the beach or in the middle of a downpour, the waterproof and highly durable TOSY Flying Disc can take it all and keep spinning!
- **Adaptable:** Perfect for freestyle tricks, night play, or competitive games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. Its weight and grip are engineered for long, straight, precise flights.

Gift the unexpected this Christmas, birthday, or during your next camping trip. The TOSY Flying Disc is more than just a gift; it's an invitation to create unforgettable moments. üíß Fear No Puddle:

üéÅ The Gift That Keeps on Glowing:
